data.description:
1. Lesion Type: Hives
2. Color & Appearance: Red, slightly rough surface texture, well-defined borders
3. Distribution Pattern: Symmetrical, covering a significant portion of the skin
4. Associated Signs: None observed
5. Severity Indicators: Mild to moderate severity

The image shows a person with a significant number of hives on their skin. The hives are red in color and have a slightly rough surface texture. They are well-defined and symmetrical, covering a large portion of the skin. There are no visible signs of scratching, inflammation, or discharge. The severity of the hives appears to be mild to moderate.
